title: There's one SMALL reason that makes me 100% like iphones way more then android.
body:
I love my androids, but there's one SINGLE THING that drives me NUTS about them that iphones have and androids don't.


That front facing camera tho.

The one on androids is so bad they have like that added beauty blend effect in it.

So badd.. i'm assuming i read something about how in asia they don't like blemishes and the camera is auto made to be like that. Makes a lot of sense, even though apple is worldwide its more for americans.

Just compare the front facing camera on both of them and look closely. You'll see what effect i'm talking about.

IT suckssssss
